snippet.description: * How Safe is Your Thanksgiving Meal? One of the most important things you can do to stay healthy this Thanksgiving involves how you eat rather than what you eat. snippet.title: Top 5 Thanksgiving Tips
snippet.description: * Top 5 Thanksgiving Tips The biggest food holiday of the year for Americans is fast approaching. Are you ready to indulge? What are your favorite treats? People don't want to hear from a dietitian how many calories are in their favorite treats. You just want to enjoy, right?
